results.title: Down there (Turkish version)
results.brief_description: Using both animation and interviews with women from many different cultural backgrounds, this program attempts to break down the myths and dispel the fears and misinformation about women’s bodily functions. Presents information about reproduction, preventative health care and contraception.
results.description: Using both animation and interviews with women from many different cultural backgrounds, this program attempts to break down the myths and dispel the fears and misinformation about women’s bodily functions. Presents information about reproduction, preventative health care and contraception.
description_for_label: Using both animation and interviews with women from many different cultural backgrounds, this program attempts to break down the myths and dispel the fears and misinformation about women’s bodily functions. Presents information about reproduction, preventative health care and contraception.

results.title: Down There (Serbian Version)
results.brief_description: A program about women’s bodies - reproduction, preventative health care and contraception. Using both animation and interviews with women from many different cultural backgrounds, it breaks down the myths, dispels the fears and misinformation by presenting easy-to-understand information about women’s bodies and how they work.

results.title: Down the up ladder
results.creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development, Chris O'Rourke and George Cass
results.brief_description: Traces the history and current professional development of marine engineering in Australia. Profiles the work aboard a large ferry, a naval destroyer and a hydrofoil. Also examines the role of electronics in mechanical systems.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development, Chris O’Rourke and George Cass
results.description: Traces the history and current professional development of marine engineering in Australia. Profiles the work aboard a large ferry, a naval destroyer and a hydrofoil. Also examines the role of electronics in mechanical systems.

results.title: Down the rivers with Sturt
results.creator_credit: Australian Instructional Films, Stamina Clothes, Jean Halliday and Lex Halliday
results.brief_description: Deals with the exploratory work of Charles Sturt; the discovery of the Murray-Darling-Murrumbidgee river system solving the mystery of the rivers, the 1829 expedition westward down the Murray to the sea. Surveys the area today: the Murrumbidgee irrigation area, its chief towns; the wide variety of primary industries - rice cultivation, stoned and citrus fruit production, cattle and sheep raising.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Australian Instructional Films, Stamina Clothes, Jean Halliday and Lex Halliday
results.description: Deals with the exploratory work of Charles Sturt; the discovery of the Murray-Darling-Murrumbidgee river system solving the mystery of the rivers, the 1829 expedition westward down the Murray to the sea. results.title: Down River
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Gippsland”.
For some, floods are a disaster, for others a necessary lifegiving event. The quite different ecology of the riverland is explored in this Gippsland Victoria series, which gives an insight into the Gippsland region and the full scope of natural phenomenon
